summary: Craft a giant club... steal a giant club... do wat ever you like with this new mod!!!!!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod so if you have any ideas please tell me.
And sorry for my bad english.

Craftable giant club

the name already tells you.. From now you can craft or loot giant clubs!!! The giant clubs have a high damage so don't hit Lydia...

to craft:
<you can craft it with every forge if you have the stuff
all you need is 2 mammoth tusk and 1 iron ingot.

good luck with killing these mammoths :)
author: Remoo0
